name: TWD Trivia - The Walking Dead Edition
name_original: TWD Trivia - The Walking Dead Edition
description:
Are you a REAL Walking Dead fan? Then we made this massive 390 original quiz questions just for YOU! You won't find a more awesome TWD quiz in the Appstore. We dare you to try! But what make TWD Trivia awesome?

- Hundreds of original trivia questions!
- Awesome background music
- Two modes (questions & guess the character picture)
- Skip questions for free

Can you guess all hundreds of the Walking Dead trivia questions and prove that you are a REAL fan!

Good luck!
